text: Al Pitrelli is an American guitarist. He is known for playing music with Megadeth, Alice Cooper, Savatage, and the Trans-Siberian Orchestra. Pitrelli joined Savatage in 1995. He played guitar on three of the band's albums. Paul O'Neill asked him to join another rock band named Trans-Siberian Orchestra, He has played on every album with the band. He joined Megadeth in 2000, but left in 2002. == References == Category:Living people Category:American guitarists Category:Megadeth members
title: Al Pitrelli
